channel.title: Functional Programming on juri.strumpflohner
channel.description: Recent content in Functional Programming on juri.strumpflohner

item.title: Haskell type conversions: converting a String to Int
item.description: Today I just finished my battle-ship game written completely in functional programming (using Haskell). In order to have the user interact with your game you clearly have to write and read from the command-line.

item.title: Haskell functional programming
item.description: Did you ever hear something about functional programming? I'm sure you did, and if you didn't you should check it out. In one sentence it is basically a more mathematical approach to programming.
